original_title: Sri Lanka rupee opens at 323.00/325.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s spot next rupee opened at 323.00/325.00 to the US dollar on Monday, dealers said.
The rupee closed at 321.00/323.50 to the US dollar on Thursday.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 was quoted down at 13.15/40 closing on Friday at 13.30/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.05.2028 was quoted at 13.40/70 percent stable from closing at 13.40/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 was quoted at 14.30/45 percent down from closing at 14.35/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 was quoted at 14.55/70 percent down from closing at 14.60/65 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 was quoted at 15.90/16.10 percent stable from closing at 15.90/16.05 percent. (Colombo/Aug03/2023)
